mapper.sql:
temp_parameter_system_variables.variables_id as temp_parameter_system_variables_variables_id, temp_parameter_system_variables.specification as temp_parameter_system_variables_specification, temp_parameter_system_variables.input_tip as temp_parameter_system_variables_input_tip, temp_parameter_system_variables.parameter_values as temp_parameter_system_variables_parameter_values, temp_parameter_system_variables.variable_name as temp_parameter_system_variables_variable_name, temp_parameter_system_variables.form_type as temp_parameter_system_variables_form_type, temp_parameter_system_variables.remark as temp_parameter_system_variables_remark, temp_parameter_system_variables.creater as temp_parameter_system_variables_creater, temp_parameter_system_variables.create_time as temp_parameter_system_variables_create_time, temp_parameter_system_variables.updater as temp_parameter_system_variables_updater, temp_parameter_system_variables.update_time as temp_parameter_system_variables_update_time
,temp_creater.user_cn_name as temp_parameter_system_variables_creater_display ,temp_updater.user_cn_name as temp_parameter_system_variables_updater_display
LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_parameter_system_variables.creater = temp_creater.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_parameter_system_variables.updater = temp_updater.user_id
